definition: A term commonly employed to refer to a specific object or concept that is positioned between two extremes or serves as a means to achieve a particular goal. It is frequently utilized in various contexts, including discussions related to strategies, methods, or solutions that are considered intermediate or average in nature.

examples.german: Das ist ein gutes Mittel gegen Kopfschmerzen.
examples.english: This is a good remedy for headaches.

examples.german: Er hat alle Mittel eingesetzt, um das Ziel zu erreichen.
examples.english: He used all means to achieve the goal.

examples.german: Die Medizin ist ein wichtiges Mittel zur Heilung.
examples.english: Medicine is an important means of healing.

examples.german: Sie hat ein gutes Mittel gefunden, um mit Stress umzugehen.
examples.english: She has found a good way to deal with stress.
